title-group.article-title: Organising the Finance of Hospitals by Simulated Markets

p.mixed-citation: As this paper was in press, the Office of Health Economics published 'A New NHS Act for 1996?' proposing that the process of determining hospitals' finances from the centre via RHAs and DHAs be abandoned in place of a system based on GPs' referrals.
